TopicTitle: Game Hangs When Trying to Launch to Runway

Articles.Content: I get the splash screen, but then nothing. No loading bar, and the game just sits there. Happens when I try to launch to either runway.

Could you send in you player.log ? (see pinned post).

Also, can you try with a brand new save game?
This has now just happened to me trying to launch a rocket from the VAB to one of the launch pads.

Happens to me too. Some extra details:

It always happens with rovers rather than planes

It always happens after launching a rover successfully, reverting to VAB, and then attempting to relaunch

Game needs to be force quit to fix it

Has happened to me 4 or 5 times now
This has happened to me when my rocket blows up on the pad.  Even if I revert back to the VAB, i cannot get to a launch pad again unless I quite and come back.
